mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ENJOY (EID, ECATEGORY, ETITLE, ETEXT, EPHONE, ELOCATION, EPRICE, ETIME, EINFO, EFILEPATH) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(EID),0)+1 FROM ENJOY), #{ecategory}, #{etitle}, #{etext}, #{ephone}, #{elocation}, #{eprice}, #{etime}, #{einfo}, #{efilepath})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ENJOY ORDER BY EID
mapper.update: UPDATE ENJOY SET ECATEGORY = #{ecategory}, ETITLE = #{etitle}, ETEXT = #{etext}, EPHONE = #{ephone}, ELOCATION = #{elocation}, EPRICE = #{eprice}, ETIME = #{etime}, EINFO = #{einfo}, EFILEPATH = #{efilepath} WHERE EID = #{eid}
mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM AS EID, F.ECATEGORY, F.ETITLE, F.ETEXT, F.EPHONE, F.ELOCATION, F.EPRICE, F.ETIME, F.EINFO, F.EFILEPATH FROM (SELECT * FROM ENJOY WHERE ECATEGORY = 'FOODS') F ORDER BY EID
SELECT ROWNUM AS EID, E.ECATEGORY, E.ETITLE, E.ETEXT, E.EPHONE, E.ELOCATION, E.EPRICE, E.ETIME, E.EINFO, E.EFILEPATH FROM (SELECT * FROM ENJOY WHERE ECATEGORY = 'ENTERTAINS') E ORDER BY EID
